module.name: physical_unit_interconnect_definition
module.keywords: module, connector, cable wiring diagram, interconnect, cable, electrical

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of minimal or high level depiction of the linkage between the items included in the product.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Part_occurrence.
